intro: Dortmanna nuttallii, commonly known as Nuttall's dock, is a flowering plant native to North America. It belongs to the family Polygonaceae, which includes plants commonly referred to as smartweeds or knotweeds. The plant is characterized by its basal leaves that are heart-shaped and have a rough texture. It produces small, greenish flowers that are clustered in dense inflorescences. Dortmanna nuttallii is often found in moist soils along stream banks and in wet meadows.
